<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dawnlight](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1534)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 18</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This shining symbol of [Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=16) depicts the goddess with her arms held wide. In the center of the symbol is a crystal reliquary with a perfect feather floating inside, glowing bright as a candle with the light of the goddess.

<document level="2" id="action-1163" />

**Craft Requirements** You have a spellcasting class feature with the [divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2) tradition.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Dawnlight
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 18</row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Standard"
>
Dawnlight (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 18</row>

**Price** 320 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

Whenever you successfully counteract magical darkness while holding this symbol, the clash of magic unleashes a momentary flash of light. Creatures with [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415) in the area of the _light_ spell or targeted by it must succeed at a DC 23 Fortitude save or be [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) for 1 round. Those with [light blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=22) are also exposed to [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=407).

 Change the list of spells to 3rd-level versions of _disrupt undead_, _light_, and [_searing light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=269). The spell attack roll and counteract modifier are +13.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Dawnlight (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 18</row>

**Price** 1,300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

A _major dawnlight_ creates a flash of light like a _greater dawnlight_, but the DC is 28. Change the list of spells to  5th-level versions of _disrupt undead_ and _light_, and 4th-level versions of _searing light_ and [_vital beacon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=359). The spell attack roll and counteract modifier are +18.
name: Dawnlight (Major)
